messages.title: Let’s show the Tories we mean business.
messages.content: Vote Labour Thursday June 8th | Polls open 7am - 10pm

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Our NHS and social care is facing a growing crisis and hospitals are under huge pressure.
Our police have lost almost 4,000 officers since 2010 making our streets less safe.
Our schools are facing cuts leading to teacher redundancies and larger class sizes.
Our councils have been targeted for bigger cuts than those in the leafy south.
Our public transport gets just £1 for every £6 spent in London and the South-East.
